TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SolutionWrapperProject extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class is used to generate an MSBuild wrapper project for a solution file or standalone VC project.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Generate (string solutionPath, string toolsVersionOverride, Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext projectBuildEventContext);
.method public static hidebysig string Generate(string solutionPath, string toolsVersionOverride, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext projectBuildEventContext) cil managed

Docs.param: Full path to the solution we are wrapping
May be null. If non-null, contains the ToolsVersion passed in on the command line
An event context for logging purposes.
Docs.summary: Given the full path to a solution, returns a string containing the v3.5 MSBuild-format wrapper project for that solution.
Docs.returns: A string containing the path to the solution.
